name: Happy Hands
description:
Happy Hands You've got some dynamic expressions, meaty hands,  and a swarm of bugs buzzing around you! Do the math and have some fun. After all, it's only a game!
  • Made for  Miz Jam 1
Controls
  • WASD and Arrow Keys
Attributions Sound effects from Freesound.org and SFXIA
  • bug flying sound - espectral
  • bug dying sound  - AlienXXX
Art Kit
  • https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
